original_text: Anyone who listens to the word but does not do what it says is like someone who looks at his face in a mirror
korean_text: 누구든지 말씀을 듣고 행하지 아니하면 그는 거울로 자기의 생긴 얼굴을 보는 사람과 같아서

sentences.original_text: Anyone who listens to the word
but does not do what it says
who looks at his face in a mirror
sentences.korean_translation: 거울에 비친 자기 얼굴을 보는 사람과 같다
